description: Try our easy to follow Pot-roasted Lamb With Figs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Potroasted Lamb With Figs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 kg boneless rolled shoulder of lamb joint

recipeInstructions.text: Add the zucchini to the roasting tin, turning them in the juices, and return to the oven for a further 30 minutes. Leave to rest in a warm place for 20 minutes before carving the lamb.
